name: Hentai Heroes
storyline:
The story of the game revolves around the adventure of a goofy looking horny guy, which you will be portraying. His goal is to build the strongest harem and save the girls from evil macho dudes. This all started when a package was mistakenly delivered to Bunny’s house that contains the ‘Fruit of Power’. As he took a bite, a man came and claims that he’s the owner of the said fruit. The owner got so anxious seeing his ‘Fruit of Power’ and challenged him to a ‘Harem Fight’.

As he goes on looking for girls who will join his harem, he encountered different kinds of girls and he had different kinds of sexual acts/intercourse with each one of them. The way the story is being told is very entertaining because aside from the sensual scenes, they also add hilarious reactions, dialogues and even parodies of some popular animes. As you progress on the adventure mode, you will be able to unlock different side quests like Pachinko, Arena, Tower of Fame, Clubs and Champions which will also give you hentai scenes.
summary:
